thread.title: Apple plans record initial production of new iPhones
thread.title_full: Apple plans record initial production of new iPhones | afr.com

author: afr.com
title: Apple plans record initial production of new iPhones
text:
Apple plans record initial production of new iPhones Apple is asking suppliers to manufacture up to 90 million units of two new iPhone models with 4.7-inch and 5.5-inch displays by December 31, the Wall Street Journal has reported.
The phones are also expected to feature Force Touch technology which can distinguish between a light tap and deep press, people familiar with the matter told the Journal .
The screen sizes are the same as in the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus. Apple is also expected to maintain the screen resolution, the newspaper reported.
The company could not immediately be reached for comment.
